rules_text:
Kicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If Evict was kicked, return all permanents attached to that creature to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: [i]“Do not tread lightly in Tvornica, trespasser. You will not find us welcoming.”[/i]
